title: 115A.935 SOLID WASTE GENERATED OUTSIDE MINNESOTA.
text:
No person shall transport into or deposit in this state, for the purpose of processing or disposal, solid waste that was generated in another state, unless the waste:
(1) meets all the solid waste management regulations of the state in which it was generated; and
(2) contains none of the items specifically banned from mixed municipal solid waste in this state, including waste tires, motor and vehicle fluids and filters, waste lead acid batteries, yard waste, major appliances, and any other item specifically banned from the waste stream under this chapter.
